name: WooCommerce Custom Add To Cart Label
author: Dipak Parmar

sections.description:
WooCommerce – Custom “Add To Cart” labels on single product pages (per product type) and archive / shop page (per product type).

Archive pages

  • Simple products
  • Variable products
  • Grouped products
  • External products
  • Bookable products
  • Subscription products

Category pages

  • Simple products
  • Variable products
  • Grouped products
  • External products
  • Bookable products
  • Subscription products

Single products page

  • Simple products
  • Variable products
  • Grouped products
  • External products
  • Bookable products
  • Subscription products

Features

  • Compatible with latest WooCommerce (3.0.0 and up)
sections.installation:
1. Download the plugin & install it to your wp-content/plugins folder (or use the Plugins menu through the WordPress Administration section)
  2. Activate the plugin
  3. Navigate to ** WooCommerce > Settings > Products > Custom Add to cart button labels **.
  4. Customise your labels.
  5. Save settings!
sections.faq:
How to use WC Custom Add To Cart Label

WC Custom Add To Cart Label Custom add to cart button all pages (archive, shop, category page, single product page)
